Key Match Events: The Brewers got off to a 3-0 lead early when Willy Adames hit a three-run home run.
The Reds battled back and scored two runs to cut their deficit to 3-2 on a Spencer Steer two RBI single.
After the Brewers added a run to extend their lead to 4-2 in the sixth, Amed Rosario hit a two-run home run to tie the game at four.
Justin Wilson gave up an opposite-field go-ahead home run to Jackson Chourio in the ninth.
Brewers' first baseman Jake Bauers made a game-saving diving play against Ty France to end the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Reds have lost 37 of their last 50 games to the Brewers.
The Reds are 11-26 in one-run games.
The Reds are 19-23 against the NL Central.
The Reds are 12-49 when allowing five runs or more.
Others: The game was played at Great American Ball Park on August 31, 2024.
